game_description: It's a party time. Slice donuts as many as possible to get high score in limited time, or don't miss slicing any donuts. See who's faster in slicing, or use your strategy for getting and using magic items out your opponent.
review_1: First, thank you developers for the game, but more please. Not enough. Love to play more. More new maps. How about 360 gameplay mode if good idea. Yes, I do recommand this good looking game for everyone to enjoy.
